instruction: Fill a large pot with enough water to cover the butternut squash by 1 inch.
Bring the water to a boil over high heat.
Peel the butternut squash and cut it into 1-inch cubes.
Add the squash cubes to the boiling water.
Reduce heat to medium and simmer for 10-15 minutes, or until the squash is fork-tender.
Drain the squash thoroughly in a colander.
Boiled butternut squash is now ready to be used in your favorite recipe.
